thread.section_title: Dharma Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: When In Rome
thread.title_full: When In Rome - Review of Dharma Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Emma C
title: When In Rome
text: Had an excellent 4 days in Rome and our stay at the Dharma Hotel was very enjoyable. The staff we encountered were friendly and helpful and we were upgraded to a bigger room when we arrived which we were delighted with. The Room was large with a big comfy bed and the bathroom was perfect for a messy couple - plenty of room for all our bits and pieces! The decor was stylish and modern but we were most impressed with the breakfast which was included in the hotel price - we weren't expecting much but the restaurant at the side of the hotel was lovely and provided a wide range of hot and cold breakfast foods which were delicious and set us up for a day of walking about the city ! Can't recommend enough, would definitely return.
